spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dohwar casts the following spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 11}):

trait.name: Merging
entries: Two dohwars can have a telepathic conversation with each other and a third willing creature of their choice, provided all three are within 30 feet of one another.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.
